channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 38

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. True true. Let's try and make it happen 2014! =)
item.content:encoded: Haha. True true. Let’s try and make it happen 2014! =)

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Hopefully we will. It probably will be pretty active, even if you don't come. As long as you 'advertise' it here on the blog, people will start joining. :)
item.content:encoded: Hopefully we will. It probably will be pretty active, even if you don’t come. As long as you ‘advertise’ it here on the blog, people will start joining. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hahaha. I never really thought about it. Definitely something I will add to the idea list. The only thing is that I would have to make it pretty active which is tough with my schedule at the moment. But it's a great idea and thanks for suggesting it! Hopefully I'll be able to make it a reality! =D
item.content:encoded: Hahaha. I never really thought about it. Definitely something I will add to the idea list. The only thing is that I would have to make it pretty active which is tough with my schedule at the moment. But it’s a great idea and thanks for suggesting it! Hopefully I’ll be able to make it a reality! =D

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Also, you would be able to do live game reviews, tournaments, games, and other awesome things! We'd probably be able to get frozensoul on board too. :D
item.content:encoded: Also, you would be able to do live game reviews, tournaments, games, and other awesome things! We’d probably be able to get frozensoul on board too. ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Sounds good! I just had a crazy (crazy-awesome) idea. You should make a BenGoZen KGS room. The possibilities are pretty much endless (or almost endless). I would totally join and others would too no doubt. Thanks for all your help!
item.content:encoded: Sounds good! I just had a crazy (crazy-awesome) idea. You should make a BenGoZen KGS room. The possibilities are pretty much endless (or almost endless). I would totally join and others would too no doubt. Thanks for all your help!

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: Thanks a lot for the info! I'll look for you next time I'm online. :)
item.content:encoded: Thanks a lot for the info! I’ll look for you next time I’m online. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: Any time! I'm cloudbrows on KGS and neagle on Twitter.
item.content:encoded: Any time! I’m cloudbrows on KGS and neagle on Twitter.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: You should totally play Nate. He's a great opponent and has a lot to offer in regards to pointers on how to take that next step forward. =)
item.content:encoded: You should totally play Nate. He’s a great opponent and has a lot to offer in regards to pointers on how to take that next step forward. =)

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: We generally play on Monday nights at 9PM EST on KGS. Sometimes we cancel, but you can always check to see! =D
item.content:encoded: We generally play on Monday nights at 9PM EST on KGS. Sometimes we cancel, but you can always check to see! =D

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: I'd love to see your game! Sounds awesome!
item.content:encoded: I’d love to see your game! Sounds awesome!
